message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is an exceptional value at $20000. We're confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we believe our product deserves a higher valuation. I would like to counter with a price of $17500 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still working within a specific budget. I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the quality and uniqueness of our product, I would like to counter with a price of $18000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $17000 for the product.
Considering the value and benefits of our product, I would like to counter with a price of $18500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am committed to staying within my budget while still acquiring a high-quality product. I would like to propose a price of $17500 for the product.
I appreciate your commitment to finding a fair price, Bob. Given the unique features of our product, I would like to counter with a price of $18250.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am very close to my budget limit. I would like to propose a final price of $17750 for the product.
